name: animkit
description: Mini librairie d'animations CSS/SCSS pour e-commerce

scripts.build: sass src/scss/main.scss dist/animkit.css --no-source-map && sass src/scss/main.scss dist/animkit.min.css --no-source-map --style=compressed
scripts.dev: npm run build && npx concurrently "sass src/scss/main.scss dist/animkit.css --watch --no-source-map" "sass src/showroom/showroom.scss src/showroom/showroom.css --watch --no-source-map" "npx live-server src/showroom --port=3000"
